game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to the village elder.
game.description: Rumors say the lost artifact is hidden in a cave deep within the forest. Be cautious, as danger lurks around every corner.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a magical amulet

task.objective: Explore the forest and locate the entrance to the cave.
task.description: You must navigate through the dense forest to find the hidden cave where the artifact is believed to be.
